channel.title: More Combat Exp
channel.description: Does anyone know how to make it so you get alot more exp when you hit a monster?[br][size=1]Posted at: November 26, 2006, 05:07:08 PM[/size][hr]Can anyone help me? >_<[br][size=1]Posted at: November 26, 2006, 05:36:11 PM[/size][hr].[br][size=1]Posted at: November 26, 2006, 07:01:23 PM[/size][hr]cant anyone help me

item.title: More Combat Exp
item.dc:creator: @Blood_Argon Blood_Argon
item.description:
@Blood_Argon wrote:

[quote=“mythicfire, post:8, topic:29910”][quote author=Demonix link=topic=43763.msg534420#msg534420 date=1164610074]
you gotta open you client.java, search for

Defence EXP

playerLevel[1]

Strength EXP

playerLevel[2]

ect…
[/quote]

a line or 2 under that there will be addXp (##*, 2)

change the # to the exp u want for doing whatever it says it does

Texp u want for doing whatever it says it does[/quote]

There is no “add exp” thing udner any of them, I’m using laxiscape
[/quote]
Laxiscape? Why not LaxativeScape, its a little more clear…

Read full topic
